summary.span: 提供有关承载 XAML 浏览器应用程序 (XBAP) 应用程序的浏览器环境的信息的帮助器类。

span.span: A helper class that provides information about the browser environment in which a XAML browser application (XBAP) application is hosted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ClientSite As Object
public: static property System::Object ^ ClientSite { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回对某个对象的引用，该对象可用于通过其 OLE 容器接口（例如，IOleClientSite::GetContainer();）来访问主机浏览器。

span.span: Returns a reference to an object that can be used to access the host browser via its OLE container interfaces (for example, IOleClientSite::GetContainer();).

value.span: 可强制转换为 的对象。

span.span: An object that can be cast to .

public: static property System::Object ^ HostScript { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 如果在框架中承载 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，则获取一个脚本对象，该对象提供对 HTML 页面的 HTML 窗口对象、自定义脚本函数以及全局变量的访问。

span.span: Gets a script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame.

value.span: 如果在框架中承载 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，则为一个脚本对象，该对象提供对 HTML 页面的 HTML 窗口对象、自定义脚本函数以及全局变量的访问；否则为 。

span.span: A script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用返回的 对象，可以访问 HTML 窗口对象的属性、方法和事件，直接调用脚本函数，或访问全局变量。With the returned object, you can access the properties, methods, and events of the HTML window object, call a script function directly, or access a global variable. 用于访问这些项的语法使用熟悉的点表示法。The syntax to access these items uses the familiar dot notation. 有关 window 对象的详细信息，请参阅动态 HTML （DHTML）文档中的[窗口对象](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274)。For more information about the window object, see [window object](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274) in the Dynamic HTML (DHTML) documentation. 如果从跨域位置导航到帧，则 属性将返回 `null`。The property returns `null` if the frame is navigated to from a cross-domain location. 可以通过设置 " **ScriptInteropDisallow** " 注册表值为 Internet Explorer 关闭此功能。This feature can be turned off for Internet Explorer by setting the **ScriptInteropDisallow** registry value. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性（WPF）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/security-wpf)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/security-wpf). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索 对象并关闭浏览器窗口。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the object and close the browser window. [!code-xaml[XbapBrowserInterop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/cs/page1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[XbapBrowserInterop#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/cs/page1.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[XbapBrowserInterop#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/xbapbrowserinterop/vb/page1.xaml.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsBrowserHosted As Boolean
public: static property bool IsBrowserHosted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序是否由浏览器承载。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application is browser hosted.

value.span: 如果该应用程序由浏览器承载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is browser hosted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是不可知的，因此，可以加载到几种不同类型的主机中，包括 、或浏览器。A can be host agnostic and, consequently, can be loaded into several different types of hosts, including a , a , or a browser. 如果库程序集包含一个或多个页面，并且该程序集由多个独立的可浏览（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]）主机应用程序引用，则可能会发生这种情况。This can happen when you have a library assembly that contains one or more pages, and which is referenced by multiple standalone and browsable ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) host applications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 确定 是否承载于浏览器中。The following example demonstrates how to use to determine if a is hosted in a browser. [!code-csharp[HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets#IsBrowserHostedCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#isbrowserhostedcode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets#IsBrowserHostedCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOBrowserInteropHelperSnippets/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#isbrowserhostedcode)]

summary.span: 获取从中启动 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 应用程序的位置的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) for the location from which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] application was launched.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅包含 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 应用程序的 。The property contains only a for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] applications. 有关 属性的示例，请参阅 。For an example of the property, see .
